data.title: Wehrmacht (Heer)
data.text:
indicate a promotion subsequently

Chart 9 - captured / POW:

The generals who surrender or were captured before 8/5/1945 are listed in this chart (for example Stalingrad, Tunisia, Bagration, Ruhr pocket).

The generals captured after this date by the allied Western forces are not listed.

The authors have listed only the generals POW in Soviet Russia after 8/5/1945, regardless if they were active or retired.

The generals sentenced by International Military Tribunal at Nürnberg or allied tribunals are not mentioned as POW.

For reason of clarity, some names have been mentioned only in one chart (for example, general Blaskowitz who committed suicide while POW at Nürnberg will appear only in chart 3 suicide and not in chart 6 died in POW camp).

Any comment, clarification, question is welcome. Please, send e-mail to Mike Miller.

The authors: Georges M. Croisier & Ken Mc Canliss
